<div align="center">
  <h1>
    HF Scavenger Hunt #1 Solutions
  </h1>
  <h3>Solutions & Background For Each Key</h3>
  <br>
  <i>This scavenger hunt challenged HF members' ability to think critically, scrap through year's of site history, and program to overcome tasks when necessary.</i>
  <br>
</div>
<h2>Hunt Stages & Solutions</h2>
<ol>
  <li>
    <b>ASCII</b>
    <br>
       
      A Sad Child Is Ill
      PID: 057 054 048 054 050 050 057
  SOLUTION:
    Convert each value to the ASCII equivalent (Reference: Decimal https://web.cs.dal.ca/~zyu/ascii.html)
    <br>
    Result: 9606229
    <br>
    Post ID Link: https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?&pid=9606229
    <br>
    </li>
  <hr>
  <li>
  <b>2: Learning About Decryption</b>
   <br>
  Navigate to the decryption website (https://codebeautify.org/encrypt-decrypt), enter the text and key below.
  <br>
  Algorithm: Twofish
  Mode: CBC
  
      

Key: HackForumsScavengerHunt
</li>
